summary.para: Changes the style and text of a language bar balloon item.

param.name: style
param.para: Contains one of the values that specifies the new balloon style.

param.name: pch
param.para: Pointer to a WCHAR buffer that contains the new text for the balloon.

param.name: cch
param.para: Contains the number of characters of the new text in pch.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

remarks.para: The language bar balloon implementation should update its style and text by modifying the values returned from and then call with TF_LBI_BALLOON to cause the language bar to obtain the updated information.

summary.para: The ITfFnBalloon interface is implemented by a text service and is used by an application or other text service to update the balloon item that the text service adds to the language bar.
An application or text service obtains an instance of this interface by calling with the class identifier of the text service and then calling with GUID_NULL and IID_ITfFnBalloon.
